info.title: Salesforce CRUD API (Full Metadata + Required Fields)
info.description:
This API specification is created for the **Ryan Project** and is intended to be used by the **Dynamics Team** to push data into Salesforce CRM.

It provides endpoints to create standard Salesforce records such as **Account**, **Contact**, **Opportunity**, and **Lead**, including detailed field-level metadata and required field validation. 

All endpoints require a valid **OAuth 2.0 Bearer token** for authentication. Ensure proper token retrieval before performing CRUD operations.

This documentation enables seamless integration between Dynamics 365 and Salesforce, supporting real-time or batch-based data exchange.

mvp_Number_of_Associated_Tax_Direct__c.description: REMOVE No of Associated Tax Direct Cases
